verse: All these things shalt thou perform strictly, observing the time.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:32
verse: And the Beloved shall abide with Thee.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:33
verse: Thou shalt not disclose the interior world of this rite unto any one: therefore have I written it in symbols that cannot be understood.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:34
verse: I who reveal the ritual am IAO and OAI; the Right and the Averse.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:35
verse: These are alike unto me.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:36
verse: Now the Veil of this operation is called Shame, and the Glory abideth within.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:37
verse: Thou shalt comfort the heart of the secret stone with the warm blood. Thou shalt make a subtle decoction of delight, and the Watchers shall drink thereof.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:38
verse: I, Apep the Serpent, am the heart of IAO. Isis shall await Asar, and I in the midst.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:39
verse: Also the Priestess shall seek another altar, and perform my ceremonies thereon.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:40
verse: There shall be no hymn nor dithyramb in my praise and the praise of the rite, seeing that it is utterly beyond.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:41
verse: Thou shalt assure thyself of the stability of the altar.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:42
verse: In this rite thou shalt be alone.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:43
verse: I will give thee another ceremony whereby many shall rejoice.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:44
verse: Before all let the Oath be taken firmly as thou raisest up the altar from the black earth.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:45
verse: In the words that Thou knowest.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:46
verse: For I also swear unto thee by my body and soul that shall never be parted in sunder that I dwell within thee coiled and ready to spring.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:47
verse: I will give thee the kingdoms of the earth, O thou Who hast mastered the kingdoms of the East and of the West.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:48
verse: I am Apep, O thou slain One. Thou shalt slay thyself upon mine altar: I will have thy blood to drink.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:49
verse: For I am a mighty vampire, and my children shall suck up the wine of the earth which is blood.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:50
verse: Thou shalt replenish thy veins from the chalice of heaven.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:51
verse: Thou shalt be secret, a fear to the world.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:52
verse: Thou shalt be exalted, and none shall see thee; exalted, and none shall suspect thee.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:53
verse: For there are two glories diverse, and thou who hast won the first shalt enjoy the second.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:54
verse: I leap with joy within thee; my head is arisen to strike.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:55
verse: O the lust, the sheer rapture, of the life of the snake in the spine!

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:56
verse: Mightier than God or man, I am in them, and pervade them.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:57
verse: Follow out these my words.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:58
verse:
Fear nothing.
Fear nothing.
Fear nothing.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:59
verse: For I am nothing, and me thou shalt fear, O my virgin, my prophet within whose bowels I rejoice.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:60
verse: Thou shalt fear with the fear of love: I will overcome thee.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:61
verse: Thou shalt be very nigh to death.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:62
verse: But I will overcome thee; the New Life shall illumine thee with the Light that is beyond the Stars.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:63
verse: Thinkest thou? I, the force that have created all, am not to be despised.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:64
verse: And I will slay thee in my lust.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:65
verse: Thou shalt scream with the joy and the pain and the fear and the love --- so that the <<Greek "LOGOS" as: LAMBDA-OMICRON-GAMMA-OMICRON-SIGMA>> of a new God leaps out among the Stars.

title: Liber Stellae Rubeae
label: LIBER LXVI I:66
verse: There shall be no sound heard but this thy lion-roar of rapture; yea, this thy lion-roar of rapture. oOo

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:0
verse: In the name of the Lord of Initiation, Amen.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:1
verse: I fly and I alight as an hawk: of mother-of-emerald are my mighty-sweeping wings.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:2
verse: I swoop down upon the black earth; and it gladdens into green at my coming.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:3
verse: Children of Earth! rejoice! rejoice exceedingly; for your salvation is at hand.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:4
verse: The end of sorrow is come; I will ravish you away into mine unutterable joy.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:5
verse: I will kiss you, and bring you to the bridal: I will spread a feast before you in the house of happiness.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:6
verse: I am not come to rebuke you, or to enslave you.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:7
verse: I bid you not turn from your voluptuous ways, from your idleness, from your follies.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:8
verse: But I bring you joy to your pleasure, peace to your languor, wisdom to your folly.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:9
verse: All that ye do is right, if so be that ye enjoy it.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:10
verse: I am come against sorrow, against weariness, against them that seek to enslave you.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:11
verse: I pour you lustral wine, that giveth you delight both at the sunset and the dawn.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:12
verse: Come with me and I will gtive you all that is desirable upon the earth.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:13
verse: Because I give you that of which the Earth and its joys are but as shadows.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:14
verse: They flee away, but my joy abideth even until the end.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:15
verse: I have hidden myself beneath a mask: I am a black and terrible God.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:16
verse: With courage conquering fear shall ye approach me: ye shall lay down your heads upon my altar, expecting the sweep of the sword.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:17
verse: But the first kiss of love shall be radiant on your lips; and all my darkness and terror shall turn to light and joy.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:18
verse: Only those who fear shall fail. Those who have bent their backs to the yoke of slavery until they can no longer stand upright; them will I despise.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:19
verse: But you who have defied the law; you who have conquered by subtlety or force; you will I take unto me, even I will take you unto me.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:20
verse: I ask you to sacrifice nothing at mine altar; I am the God who giveth all.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:21
verse: Light, Life, Love; Force, Fantasy, Fire; these do I bring you: mine hands are full of these.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:22
verse: There is joy in the setting-out; there is joy in the journey; there is joy in the goal.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:23
verse: Only if ye are sorrowful, or weary, or angry, or discomforted; then ye may know that ye have lost the golden thread, the thread wherewith I guide you to the heart of the groves of Eleusis.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:24
verse: My disciples are proud and beautiful; they are strong and swift; they rule their ways like mighty conqueors.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:25
verse: The weak, the timid, the imperfect, the cowardly, the poor, the tearful--these are mine enemies, and I am come to destroy them.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:26
verse: This also is compassion: an end to the sickness of earth. A rooting-out of the weeds: a watering of the flowers.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:27
verse: O my children, ye are more beautiful than the flowers: ye must not fade in your season.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:28
verse: I love you; I would sprinkle you with the divine dew of immortality.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:29
verse: This immortality is no vain hope beyond the grave: I offer you the the certain consciousness of bliss.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:30
verse: I offer it at once, on earth; before an hour hath struck upon the bell, ye shall be with Me in the Abodes that are beyond Decay.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:31
verse: Also I give you power earthly and joy earthly; wealth, and health, and length of days. Adoration and love shall cling to your feet, and twine around your heart.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:32
verse: Only your mouths shall drink of a delicious wine-- the wine of Iacchus; they shall reach ever to the heavenly kiss of the Beautiful God.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:33
verse: I reveal unto you a great mystery. Ye stand between the abyss of height and the abyss of depth.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:34
verse: In either awaits you a Companion; and that Companion is Yourself.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:35
verse: Ye can have no other Companion.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:36
verse: Many have arisen, being wise. They have said, "Seek out the glittering Image in the place ever golden, and unite yourself with It."

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:37
verse: Many have arisen, being foolish. They have said "Stoop down unto the darkly splendid world, and be wedded to that Blind Creature of the Slime."

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:38
verse: I who am beyond Wisdom and Folly, arise and say unto you: achieve both weddings! Unite yourself with both!

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:39
verse: Beware, beware, I say, lest ye seek after one and lose the other!

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:40
verse: My adepts stand upright; their head above the heavens, their feet below the hells.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:41
verse: But since one is naturally attracted to the Angel, another to the Demon, let the first strengthen the lowerlink, the last attach more firmly to the higher.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:42
verse: Thus shall equilibrium become perfect. I will aid my disciples; as fast as they acquire this balanced power and joy so faster will I push them.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:43
verse: They shall in their turn speak from this invisible Throne; their words shall illumine the worlds.

title: Liber TZADDI Vel Hamus Hermeticus Sub Figura XC
label: LIBER XC I:44
verse: They shall be masters of majesty and might; they shall be beautiful and joyous; they shall be clothed with victory and spledour; they shall stand upon the firm foundation; the kingdom shall be theirs; yea, the kingdom shall be theirs. In the name of the Lord of Initiation. Amen.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:1
verse: This is the secret of the Holy Graal, that is the sacred vessel of our Lady, the Scarlet Woman, Babalon the Mother of Abominations, the Bride of Chaos, that rideth upon our Lord the Beast.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:2
verse: Thou shalt drain out thy blood that is thy life into the golden cup of her fornication.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:3
verse: Thou shalt mingle thy life with the universal life. Thou shalt keep not back one drop.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:4
verse: Then shall thy brain be dumb, and thy heart beat no more, and all thy life shall go from thee; and thou shalt be cast out upon the midden, and the birds of the air shall feast upon thy flesh, and thy bones shall whiten in the sun.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:5
verse: Then shall the winds gather themselves together and bear thee up as it were a little heap of dust in a sheet that hath four corners, and they shall give it unto the guardian of the Abyss.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:6
verse: And because there is no life therein, the guardian of the Abyss shall bid the angels of the winds pass by. And the name thereof shall be no more.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:7
verse: Now therefore that thou mayest achieve this ritual of the Holy Graal, do thou divest thyself of all thy goods.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:8
verse: Thou hast wealth; give it unto them that have need thereof, yet no desire toward it.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:9
verse: Thou hast health; slay thyself in the fervour of thine abandonment unto Our Lady. Let thy flesh hang loose upon thy bones, and thine eyes glare with thy quenchless lust unto the Infinite, with thy passion for the Unknown, for Her that is beyond Knowledge the accursed one.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:10
verse: Thou hast love; tear thy mother from thine heart and spit in the face of thy father. Let thy foot trample the belly of thy wife, and let the babe at her breast be the prey of dogs and vultures.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:11
verse: For if thou dost not this with thy will, then shall We do this despite thy will. So that thou attain to the Sacrament of the Graal in the Chapel of Abominations.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:12
verse: And behold! If by stealth thou keep unto thyself one thought of thine, then shalt thou be cast out into the abyss for ever; and thou shalt be the lonely one, the eater of dung, the afflicted in the Day of Be-With-Us.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:13
verse: Yea! verily this is the Truth, this is the Truth, this is the Truth. Unto thee shall be granted joy and health and wealth and wisdom when thou art no longer thou.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:14
verse: Then shall every gain be a new sacrament, and it shall not defile thee; thou shalt revel with the wantons in the market place, and the virgins shall fling roses upon thee, and the merchants bend their knees and bring thee gold and spices. Also young boys shall pour wonderful wines for thee, and the singers and the dancers shall sing and dance for thee.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:15
verse: Yet shalt thou not be therein, for thou shalt be forgotten, dust lost in dust.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:16
verse: Nor shall the aeon itself avail thee in this; for from the dust shall a white ash be prepared by Hermes the Invisible.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:17
verse: And this is the wrath of god, that these things should be thus.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:18
verse: And this is the grace of God, that these things should be thus.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:19
verse: Wherefore I charge you that ye come unto me in the Beginning; for if ye take but one step in this Path, ye must arrive inevitably at the end thereof.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:20
verse: This Path is beyond Life and Death; it is also beyond Love, but that ye know not, for ye know not Love.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:21
verse: And the end thereof is known not even unto Our Lady, nor to the Beast whereon She rideth, nor unto the Virgin her daughter, nor unto Chaos her lawful Lord; but unto the Crowned Child is it known? It is not known if it be known.

title: Liber Cheth Vel Vallum Abiegni Sub Figura CLVI
label: LIBER CLVI I:22
verse: Therefore unto Hadit and unto Nuit be the glory in the End and the Beginning; yea, in the End and the Beginning.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:1
verse: Had! The manifestation of Nuit.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:2
verse: The unveiling of the company of heaven.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:3
verse: Every man and every woman is a star.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:4
verse: Every number is infinite; there is no difference.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:5
verse: Help me, o warrior lord of Thebes, in my unveiling before the Children of men!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:6
verse: Be thou Hadit, my secret centre, my heart & my tongue!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:7
verse: Behold! it is revealed by Aiwass the minister of Hoor-paar-kraat.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:8
verse: The Khabs is in the Khu, not the Khu in the Khabs.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:9
verse: Worship then the Khabs, and behold my light shed over you!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:10
verse: Let my servants be few & secret: they shall rule the many & the known.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:11
verse: These are fools that men adore; both their Gods & their men are fools.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:12
verse: Come forth, o children, under the stars, & take your fill of love!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:13
verse: I am above you and in you. My ecstasy is in yours. My joy is to see your joy.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:14
verse:
Above, the gemmed azure is
The naked splendour of Nuit;
She bends in ecstasy to kiss
The secret ardours of Hadit.
The winged globe, the starry blue,
Are mine, O Ankh-af-na-khonsu!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:15
verse: Now ye shall know that the chosen priest & apostle of infinite space is the prince-priest the Beast; and in his woman called the Scarlet Woman is all power given. They shall gather my children into their fold: they shall bring the glory of the stars into the hearts of men.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:16
verse: For he is ever a sun, and she a moon. But to him is the winged secret flame, and to her the stooping starlight.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:17
verse: But ye are not so chosen.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:18
verse: Burn upon their brows, o splendrous serpent!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:19
verse: O azure-lidded woman, bend upon them!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:20
verse: The key of the rituals is in the secret word which I have given unto him.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:21
verse: With the God & the Adorer I am nothing: they do not see me. They are as upon the earth; I am Heaven, and there is no other God than me, and my lord Hadit.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:22
verse: Now, therefore, I am known to ye by my name Nuit, and to him by a secret name which I will give him when at last he knoweth me. Since I am Infinite Space, and the Infinite Stars thereof, do ye also thus. Bind nothing! Let there be no difference made among you between any one thing & any other thing; for thereby there cometh hurt.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:23
verse: But whoso availeth in this, let him be the chief of all!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:24
verse: I am Nuit, and my word is six and fifty.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:25
verse: Divide, add, multiply, and understand.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:26
verse: Then saith the prophet and slave of the beauteous one: Who am I, and what shall be the sign? So she answered him, bendingdown, a lambent flame of blue, all-touching, all penetrant, her lovely hands upon the black earth, & her lithe body arched for love, and her soft feet not hurting the little flowers: Thou knowest! And the sign shall be my ecstasy, the consciousness of the continuity of existence, the omnipresence of my body.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:27
verse: Then the priest answered & said unto the Queen of Space, kissing her lovely brows, and the dew of her light bathing his whole body in a sweet-smelling perfume of sweat: O Nuit, continuous one of Heaven, let it be ever thus; that men speak not of Thee as One but as None; and let them speak not of thee at all, since thou art continuous!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:28
verse: None, breathed the light, faint & faery, of the stars, and two.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:29
verse: For I am divided for love's sake, for the chance of union.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:30
verse: This is the creation of the world, that the pain of division is as nothing, and the joy of dissolution all.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:31
verse: For these fools of men and their woes care not thou at all! They feel little; what is, is balanced by weak joys; but ye are my chosen ones.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:32
verse: Obey my prophet! follow out the ordeals of my knowledge! seek me only! Then the joys of my love will redeem ye from all pain. This is so: I swear it by the vault of my body; by my sacred heart and tongue; by all I can give, by all I desire of ye all.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:33
verse: Then the priest fell into a deep trance or swoon, & said unto the Queen of Heaven; Write unto us the ordeals; write unto us the rituals; write unto us the law!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:34
verse: But she said: the ordeals I write not: the rituals shall be half known and half concealed: the Law is for all.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:35
verse: This that thou writest is the threefold book of Law.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:36
verse: My scribe Ankh-af-na-khonsu, the priest of the princes, shall not in one letter change this book; but lest there be folly, he shall comment thereupon by the wisdom of Ra-Hoor-Khuit.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:37
verse: Also the mantras and spells; the obeah and the wanga; the work of the wand and the work of the sword; these he shall learn and teach.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:38
verse: He must teach; but he may make severe the ordeals.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:39
verse: The word of the Law is THELEMA.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:40
verse: Who calls us Thelemites will do no wrong, if he look but close into the word. For there are therein Three Grades, the Hermit, and the Lover, and the man of Earth. Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:41
verse: The word of Sin is Restriction. O man! refuse not thy wife, if she will! O lover, if thou wilt, depart! There is no bond that can unite the divided but love: all else is a curse. Accursed! Accursed be it to the aeons! Hell.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:42
verse: Let it be that state of manyhood bound and loathing. So with thy all; thou hast no right but to do thy will.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:43
verse: Do that, and no other shall say nay.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:44
verse: For pure will, unassuaged of purpose, delivered from the lust of result, is every way perfect.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:45
verse: The Perfect and the Perfect are one Perfect and not two; nay, are none!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:46
verse: Nothing is a secret key of this law. Sixty-one the Jews call it; I call it eight, eighty, four hundred & eighteen.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:47
verse: But they have the half: unite by thine art so that all disappear.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:48
verse: My prophet is a fool with his one, one, one; are not they the Ox, and none by the Book?

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:49
verse: Abrogate are all rituals, all ordeals, all words and signs. Ra-Hoor-Khuit hath taken his seat in the East at the Equinox of the Gods; and let Asar be with Isa, who also are one. But they are not of me. Let Asar be the adorant, Isa the sufferer; Hoor in his secret name and splendour is the Lord initiating.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:50
verse: There is a word to say about the Hierophantic task. Behold! there are three ordeals in one, and it may be given in three ways. The gross must pass through fire; let the fine be tried in intellect, and the lofty chosen ones in the highest. Thus ye have star & star, system & system; let not one know well the other!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:51
verse: There are four gates to one palace; the floor of that palace is of silver and gold; lapis lazuli & jasper are there; and all rare scents; jasmine & rose, and the emblems of death. Let him enter in turn or at once the four gates; let him stand on the floor of the palace. Will he not sink? Amn. Ho! warrior, if thy servant sink? But there are means and means. Be goodly therefore: dress ye all in fine apparel; eat rich foods and drink sweet wines and wines that foam! Also, take your fill and will of love as ye will, when, where and with whom ye will! But always unto me.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:52
verse: If this be not aright; if ye confound the space-marks, saying: They are one; or saying, They are many; if the ritual be not ever unto me: then expect the direful judgments of Ra Hoor Khuit!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:53
verse: This shall regenerate the world, the little world my sister, my heart & my tongue, unto whom I send this kiss. Also, o scribe and prophet, though thou be of the princes, it shall not assuage thee nor absolve thee. But ecstasy be thine and joy of earth: ever To me! To me!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:54
verse: Change not as much as the style of a letter; for behold! thou, o prophet, shalt not behold all these mysteries hidden therein.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:55
verse: The child of thy bowels, he shall behold them.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:56
verse: Expect him not from the East, nor from the West; for from no expected house cometh that child. Aum! All words are sacred and all prophets true; save only that they understand a little; solve the first half of the equation, leave the second unattacked. But thou hast all in the clear light, and some, though not all, in the dark.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:57
verse:
Invoke me under my stars! Love is the law, love under will. Nor let the fools mistake love; for there are love and love. There is the dove, and there is the serpent. Choose ye well! He, my prophet, hath chosen, knowing the law of the fortress, and the great mystery of the House of God.
All these old letters of my Book are aright; but [Tzaddi] is not the Star. This also is secret: my prophet shall reveal it to the wise.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:58
verse: I give unimaginable joys on earth: certainty, not faith, while in life, upon death; peace unutterable, rest, ecstasy; nor do I demand aught in sacrifice.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:59
verse: My incense is of resinous woods & gums; and there is no blood therein: because of my hair the trees of Eternity.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:60
verse: My number is 11, as all their numbers who are of us. The Five Pointed Star, with a Circle in the Middle, & the circle is Red. My colour is black to the blind, but the blue & gold are seen of the seeing. Also I have asecret glory for them that love me.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:61
verse: But to love me is better than all things: if under the night stars in the desert thou presently burnest mine incense before me, invoking me with a pure heart, and the Serpent flame therein, thou shalt come a little to lie in my bosom. For one kiss wilt thou then be willing to give all; but whoso gives one particle of dust shall lose all in that hour. Ye shall gather goods and store of women and spices; ye shall wear rich jewels; ye shall exceed the nations of the earth in spendour & pride; but always in the love of me, and so shall ye come to my joy. I charge you earnestly to come before me in a single robe, and covered with a rich headdress. I love you! I yearn to you! Pale or purple, veiled or voluptuous, I who am all pleasure and purple, and drunkenness of the innermost sense, desire you. Put on the wings, and arouse the coiled splendour within you: come unto me!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:62
verse: At all my meetings with you shall the priestess say -- and her eyes shall burn with desire as she stands bare and rejoicing in my secret temple -- To me! To me! calling forth the flame of the hearts of all in her love-chant.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:63
verse: Sing the rapturous love-song unto me! Burn to me perfumes! Wear to me jewels! Drink to me, for I love you! I love you!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:64
verse: I am the blue-lidded daughter of Sunset; I am the naked brilliance of the voluptuous night-sky.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:65
verse: To me! To me!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX I:66
verse: The Manifestation of Nuit is at an end.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:1
verse: Nu! the hiding of Hadit.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:2
verse: Come! all ye, and learn the secret that hath not yet been revealed. I, Hadit, am the complement of Nu, my bride. I am not extended, and Khabs is the name of my House.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:3
verse: In the sphere I am everywhere the centre, as she, the circumference, is nowhere found.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:4
verse: Yet she shall be known & I never.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:5
verse: Behold! the rituals of the old time are black. Let the evil ones be cast away; let the good ones be purged by the prophet! Then shall this Knowledge go aright.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:6
verse: I am the flame that burns in every heart of man, and in the core of every star. I am Life, and the giver of Life, yet therefore is theknowledge of me the knowledge of death.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:7
verse: I am the Magician and the Exorcist. I am the axle of the wheel, and the cube in the circle. "Come unto me" is a foolish word: for it is I that go.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:8
verse: Who worshipped Heru-pa-kraath have worshipped me; ill, for I am the worshipper.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:9
verse: Remember all ye that existence is pure joy; that all the sorrows are but as shadows; they pass & are done; but there is that which remains.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:10
verse: O prophet! thou hast ill will to learn this writing.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:11
verse: I see thee hate the hand & the pen; but I am stronger.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:12
verse: Because of me in Thee which thou knewest not.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:13
verse: for why? Because thou wast the knower, and me.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:14
verse: Now let there be a veiling of this shrine: now let the light devour men and eat them up with blindness!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:15
verse: For I am perfect, being Not; and my number is nine by the fools; but with the just I am eight, and one in eight: Which is vital, for I am none indeed. The Empress and the King are not of me; for there is a further secret.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:16
verse: I am The Empress & the Hierophant. Thus eleven, as my bride is eleven.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:17
verse:
Hear me, ye people of sighing!
The sorrows of pain and regret
Are left to the dead and the dying,
The folk that not know me as yet.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:18
verse: These are dead, these fellows; they feel not. We are not for the poor and sad: the lords of the earth are our kinsfolk.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:19
verse: Is a God to live in a dog? No! but the highest are of us. They shall rejoice, our chosen: who sorroweth is not of us.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:20
verse: Beauty and strength, leaping laughter and delicious languor, force and fire, are of us.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:21
verse: We have nothing with the outcast and the unfit: let them die in their misery. For they feel not. Compassion is the vice of kings: stamp down the wretched & the weak: this is the law of the strong: this is our law and the joy of the world. Think not, o king, upon that lie: That Thou Must Die: verily thou shalt not die, but live. Now let it be understood: If the body of the King dissolve, he shall remain in pure ecstasy for ever. Nuit! Hadit! Ra-Hoor-Khuit! The Sun, Strength & Sight, Light; these are for the servants of the Star & the Snake.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:22
verse: I am the Snake that giveth Knowledge & Delight and bright glory, and stir the hearts of men with drunkenness. To worship me take wine and strange drugs whereof I will tell my prophet, & be drunk thereof! They shall not harm ye at all. It is a lie, this folly against self. The exposure of innocence is a lie. Be strong, o man! lust, enjoy all things of sense and rapture: fear not that any God shall deny thee for this.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:23
verse: I am alone: there is no God where I am.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:24
verse: Behold! these be grave mysteries; for there are also of my friends who be hermits. Now think not to find them in the forest or on the mountain; but in beds of purple, caressed by magnificent beasts of women with large limbs, and fire and light in their eyes, and masses of flaming hair about them; there shall ye find them. Ye shall see them at rule, at victorious armies, at all the joy; and there shall be in them a joy a million times greater than this. Beware lest any force another, King against King! Love one another with burning hearts; on the low men trample in the fierce lust of your pride, in the day of your wrath.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:25
verse: Ye are against the people, O my chosen!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:26
verse: I am the secret Serpent coiled about to spring: in my coiling there is joy. If I lift up my head, I and my Nuit are one. If I droop down mine head, and shoot forth venom, then is rapture of the earth, and I and the earth are one.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:27
verse: There is great danger in me; for who doth not understand these runes shall make a great miss. He shall fall down into the pit called Because, and there he shall perish with the dogs of Reason.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:28
verse: Now a curse upon Because and his kin!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:29
verse: May Because be accursed for ever!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:30
verse: If Will stops and cries Why, invoking Because, then Will stops & does nought.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:31
verse: If Power asks why, then is Power weakness.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:32
verse: Also reason is a lie; for there is a factor infinite & unknown; & all their words are skew-wise.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:33
verse: Enough of Because! Be he damned for a dog!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:34
verse: But ye, o my people, rise up & awake!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:35
verse: Let the rituals be rightly performed with joy & beauty!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:36
verse: There are rituals of the elements and feasts of the times.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:37
verse: A feast for the first night of the Prophet and his Bride!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:38
verse: A feast for the three days of the writing of the Book of the Law.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:39
verse: A feast for Tahuti and the child of the Prophet--secret, O Prophet!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:40
verse: A feast for the Supreme Ritual, and a feast for the Equinox of the Gods.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:41
verse: A feast for fire and a feast for water; a feast for life and a greater feast for death!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:42
verse: A feast every day in your hearts in the joy of my rapture!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:43
verse: A feast every night unto Nu, and the pleasure of uttermost delight!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:44
verse: Aye! feast! rejoice! there is no dread hereafter. There is the dissolution, and eternal ecstasy in the kisses of Nu.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:45
verse: There is death for the dogs.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:46
verse: Dost thou fail? Art thou sorry? Is fear in thine heart?

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:47
verse: Where I am these are not.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:48
verse: Pity not the fallen! I never knew them. I am not for them. I console not: I hate the consoled & the consoler.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:49
verse: I am unique & conqueror. I am not of the slaves that perish. Be they damned & dead! Amen. (This is of the 4: there is a fifth who is invisible, & therein am I as a babe in an egg. )

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:50
verse: Blue am I and gold in the light of my bride: but the red gleam is in my eyes; & my spangles are purple & green.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:51
verse: Purple beyond purple: it is the light higher than eyesight.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:52
verse: There is a veil: that veil is black. It is the veil of the modest woman; it is the veil of sorrow, & the pall of death: this is none of me. Tear down that lying spectre of the centuries: veil not your vices in virtuous words: these vices are my service; ye do well, & I will reward you here and hereafter.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:53
verse: Fear not, o prophet, when these words are said, thou shalt not be sorry. Thou art emphatically my chosen; and blessed are the eyes that thou shalt look upon with gladness. But I will hide thee in a mask of sorrow: they that see thee shall fear thou art fallen: but I lift thee up.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:54
verse: Nor shall they who cry aloud their folly that thou meanest nought avail; thou shall reveal it: thou availest: they are the slaves of because: They are not of me. The stops as thou wilt; the letters? change them not in style or value!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:55
verse: Thou shalt obtain the order & value of the English Alphabet; thou shalt find new symbols to attribute them unto.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:56
verse: Begone! ye mockers; even though ye laugh in my honour ye shall laugh not long: then when ye are sad know that I have forsaken you.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:57
verse: He that is righteous shall be righteous still; he that is filthy shall be filthy still.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:58
verse: Yea! deem not of change: ye shall be as ye are, & not other. Therefore the kings of the earth shall be Kings for ever: the slaves shall serve. There is none that shall be cast down or lifted up: all is ever as it was. Yet there are masked ones my servants: it may be that yonder beggar is a King. A King may choose his garment as he will: there is no certain test: but a beggar cannot hide his poverty.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:59
verse: Beware therefore! Love all, lest perchance is a King concealed! Say you so? Fool! If he be a King, thou canst not hurt him.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:60
verse: Therefore strike hard & low, and to hell with them, master!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:61
verse: There is a light before thine eyes, o prophet, a light undesired, most desirable.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:62
verse: I am uplifted in thine heart; and the kisses of the stars rain hard upon thy body.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:63
verse: Thou art exhaust in the voluptuous fullness of the inspiration; the expiration is sweeter than death, more rapid and laughterful than a caress of Hell's own worm.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:64
verse: Oh! thou art overcome: we are upon thee; our delight is all over thee: hail! hail: prophet of Nu! prophet of Had! prophet of Ra-Hoor-Khu! Now rejoice! now come in our splendour & rapture! Come in our passionate peace, & write sweet words for the Kings.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:65
verse: I am the Master: thou art the Holy Chosen One.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:66
verse: Write, & find ecstasy in writing! Work, & be our bed in working! Thrill with the joy of life & death! Ah! thy death shall be lovely: whososeeth it shall be glad. Thy death shall be the seal of the promise of our age long love. Come! lift up thine heart & rejoice! We are one; we are none.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:67
verse: Hold! Hold! Bear up in thy rapture; fall not in swoon of the excellent kisses!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:68
verse: Harder! Hold up thyself! Lift thine head! breathe not so deep -- die!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:69
verse: Ah! Ah! What do I feel? Is the word exhausted?

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:70
verse: There is help & hope in other spells. Wisdom says: be strong! Then canst thou bear more joy. Be not animal; refine thy rapture! If thou drink, drink by the eight and ninety rules of art: if thou love, exceed by delicacy; and if thou do aught joyous, let there be subtlety therein!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:71
verse: But exceed! exceed!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:72
verse: Strive ever to more! and if thou art truly mine -- and doubt it not, an if thou art ever joyous! -- death is the crown of all.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:73
verse: Ah! Ah! Death! Death! thou shalt long for death. Death is forbidden, o man, unto thee.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:74
verse: The length of thy longing shall be the strength of its glory. He that lives long & desires death much is ever the King among the Kings.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:75
verse: Aye! listen to the numbers & the words:

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:76
verse: 4 6 3 8 A B K 2 4 A L G M O R 3 Y X 24 89 R P S T O V A L. What meaneth this, o prophet? Thou knowest not; nor shalt thou know ever. There cometh one to follow thee: he shall expound it. But remember, o chose none, to be me; to follow the love of Nu in the star-lit heaven; to look forth upon men, to tell them this glad word.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:77
verse: O be thou proud and mighty among men!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:78
verse: Lift up thyself! for there is none like unto thee among men or among Gods! Lift up thyself, o my prophet, thy stature shall surpass the stars. They shall worship thy name, foursquare, mystic, wonderful, the number of the man; and the name of thy house 418.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX II:79
verse: The end of the hiding of Hadit; and blessing & worship to the prophet of the lovely Star!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:1
verse: Abrahadabra; the reward of Ra Hoor Khut.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:2
verse: There is division hither homeward; there is a word not known. Spelling is defunct; all is not aught. Beware! Hold! Raise the spell of Ra-Hoor-Khuit!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:3
verse: Now let it be first understood that I am a god of War and of Vengeance. I shall deal hardly with them.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:4
verse: Choose ye an island!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:5
verse: Fortify it!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:6
verse: Dung it about with enginery of war!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:7
verse: I will give you a war-engine.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:8
verse: With it ye shall smite the peoples; and none shall stand before you.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:9
verse: Lurk! Withdraw! Upon them! this is the Law of the Battle of Conquest: thus shall my worship be about my secret house.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:10
verse: Get the stele of revealing itself; set it in thy secret temple -- and that temple is already aright disposed -- & it shall be your Kiblah for ever. It shall not fade, but miraculous colour shall come back to it day after day. Close it in locked glass for a proof to the world.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:11
verse: This shall be your only proof. I forbid argument. Conquer! That is enough. I will make easy to you the abstruction from the ill-ordered house in the Victorious City. Thou shalt thyself convey it with worship, o prophet, though thou likest it not. Thou shalt have danger & trouble. Ra-Hoor-Khu is with thee. Worship me with fire & blood; worship me with swords & with spears. Let the woman be girt with a sword before me: let blood flow to my name. Trample down the Heathen; be upon them, o warrior, I will give you of their flesh to eat!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:12
verse: Sacrifice cattle, little and big: after a child.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:13
verse: But not now.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:14
verse: Ye shall see that hour, o blessed Beast, and thou the Scarlet Concubine of his desire!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:15
verse: Ye shall be sad thereof.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:16
verse: Deem not too eagerly to catch the promises; fear not to undergo the curses. Ye, even ye, know not this meaning all.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:17
verse: Fear not at all; fear neither men nor Fates, nor gods, nor anything. Money fear not, nor laughter of the folk folly, nor any other power in heaven or upon the earth or under the earth. Nu is your refuge as Hadit your light; and I am the strength, force, vigour, of your arms.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:18
verse: Mercy let be off; damn them who pity! Kill and torture; spare not; be upon them!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:19
verse: That stele they shall call the Abomination of Desolation; count well its name, & it shall be to you as 718.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:20
verse: Why? Because of the fall of Because, that he is not there again.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:21
verse: Set up my image in the East: thou shalt buy thee an image which I will show thee, especial, not unlike the one thou knowest. And it shall be suddenly easy for thee to do this.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:22
verse: The other images group around me to support me: let all be worshipped, for they shall cluster to exalt me. I am the visible object of worship; the others are secret; for the Beast & his Bride are they: and for the winners of the Ordeal x. What is this? Thou shalt know.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:23
verse: For perfume mix meal & honey & thick leavings of red wine: then oil of Abramelin and olive oil, and afterward soften & smooth down with rich fresh blood.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:24
verse: The best blood is of the moon, monthly: then the fresh blood of a child, or dropping from the host of heaven: then of enemies; then of the priest or of the worshippers: last of some beast, no matter what.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:25
verse: This burn: of this make cakes & eat unto me. This hath also another use; let it be laid before me, and kept thick with perfumes of your orison: it shall become full of beetles as it were and creeping things sacred unto me.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:26
verse: These slay, naming your enemies; & they shall fall before you.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:27
verse: Also these shall breed lust & power of lust in you at the eating thereof.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:28
verse: Also ye shall be strong in war.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:29
verse: Moreover, be they long kept, it is better; for they swell with my force. All before me.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:30
verse: My altar is of open brass work: burn thereon in silver or gold!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:31
verse: There cometh a rich man from the West who shall pour his gold upon thee.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:32
verse: From gold forge steel!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:33
verse: Be ready to fly or to smite!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:34
verse: But your holy place shall be untouched throughout the centuries: though with fire and sword it be burnt down & shattered, yet an invisible house there standeth, and shall stand until the fall of the Great Equinox; when Hrumachis shall arise and the double-wanded one assume my throne and place. Another prophet shall arise, and bring fresh fever from the skies; another woman shall awakethe lust & worship of the Snake; another soul of God and beast shall mingle in the globed priest; another sacrifice shall stain the tomb; another king shall reign; and blessing no longer be poured To the Hawk-headed mystical Lord!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:35
verse: The half of the word of Heru-ra-ha, called Hoor-pa-kraat and Ra-Hoor-Khut.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:36
verse: Then said the prophet unto the God:

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:37
verse:
I adore thee in the song --
I am the Lord of Thebes, and I
The inspired forth-speaker of Mentu;
For me unveils the veiled sky,
The self-slain Ankh-af-na-khonsu
Whose words are truth. I invoke, I greet
Thy presence, O Ra-Hoor-Khuit!
Unity uttermost showed!
I adore the might of Thy breath,
Supreme and terrible God,
Who makest the gods and death
To tremble before Thee: --
I, I adore thee!
Appear on the throne of Ra!
Open the ways of the Khu!
Lighten the ways of the Ka!
The ways of the Khabs run through
To stir me or still me!
Aum! let it fill me!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:38
verse:
So that thy light is in me; & its red flame is as a sword in my hand to push thy order. There is a secret door that I shall make to establish thy way in all the quarters, (these are the adorations, as thou hast written), as it is said:
The light is mine; its rays consume
Me: I have made a secret door
Into the House of Ra and Tum,
Of Khephra and of Ahathoor.
I am thy Theban, O Mentu,
The prophet Ankh-af-na-khonsu!
By Bes-na-Maut my breast I beat;
By wise Ta-Nech I weave my spell.
Show thy star-splendour, O Nuit!
Bid me within thine House to dwell,
O winged snake of light, Hadit!
Abide with me, Ra-Hoor-Khuit!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:39
verse: All this and a book to say how thou didst come hither and a reproduction of this ink and paper for ever -- for in it is the word secret & not only in the English -- and thy comment upon this the Book of the Law shall be printed beautifully in red ink and black upon beautiful paper made by hand; and to each man and woman that thou meetest, were it but to dine or to drink at them, it is the Law to give. Then they shall chance to abide in this bliss or no; it is no odds. Do this quickly!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:40
verse: But the work of the comment? That is easy; and Hadit burning in thy heart shall make swift and secure thy pen.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:41
verse: Establish at thy Kaaba a clerk-house: all must be done well and with business way.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:42
verse: The ordeals thou shalt oversee thyself, save only the blind ones. Refuse none, but thou shalt know & destroy the traitors. I am Ra-Hoor-Khuit; and I am powerful to protect my servant. Success is thy proof: argue not; convert not; talk not over much! Them that seek to entrap thee, to overthrow thee, them attack without pity or quarter; & destroy them utterly. Swift as a trodden serpent turn and strike! Be thou yet deadlier than he! Drag down their souls to awful torment: laugh at their fear: spit upon them!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:43
verse: Let the Scarlet Woman beware! If pity and compassion and tenderness visit her heart; if she leave my work to toy with old sweetnesses; then shall my vengeance be known. I will slay me her child: I will alienate her heart: I will cast her out from men: as a shrinking and despised harlot shall she crawl through dusk wet streets, and die cold and an-hungered.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:44
verse: But let her raise herself in pride! Let her follow me in my way! Let her work the work of wickedness! Let her kill her heart! Let her be loud and adulterous! Let her be covered with jewels, and rich garments, and let her be shameless before all men!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:45
verse: Then will I lift her to pinnacles of power: then will I breed from her a child mightier than all the kings of the earth. I will fill her with joy: with my force shall she see & strike at the worship of Nu: she shall achieve Hadit.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:46
verse: I am the warrior Lord of the Forties: the Eighties cower before me, & are abased. I will bring you to victory & joy: I will be at your arms in battle & ye shall delight to slay. Success is your proof; courage is your armour; go on, go on, in my strength; & ye shall turn not back for any!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:47
verse: This book shall be translated into all tongues: but always with the original in the writing of the Beast; for in the chance shape of the letters and their position to one another: in these are mysteries that no Beast shall divine. Let him not seek to try: but one cometh after him, whence I say not, who shall discover the Key of it all. Then this line drawn is a key: then this circle squared in its failure is a key also. And Abrahadabra. It shall be his child & that strangely. Let him not seek after this; for thereby alone can he fall from it.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:48
verse: Now this mystery of the letters is done, and I want to go on to the holier place.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:49
verse: I am in a secret fourfold word, the blasphemy against all gods of men.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:50
verse: Curse them! Curse them! Curse them!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:51
verse: With my Hawk's head I peck at the eyes of Jesus as he hangs upon the cross.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:52
verse: I flap my wings in the face of Mohammed & blind him.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:53
verse: With my claws I tear out the flesh of the Indian and the Buddhist, Mongol and Din.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:54
verse: Bahlasti! Ompehda! I spit on your crapulous creeds.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:55
verse: Let Mary inviolate be torn upon wheels: for her sake let all chaste women be utterly despised among you!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:56
verse: Also for beauty's sake and love's!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:57
verse: Despise also all cowards; professional soldiers who dare not fight, but play; all fools despise!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:58
verse: But the keen and the proud, the royal and the lofty; ye are brothers!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:59
verse: As brothers fight ye!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:60
verse: There is no law beyond Do what thou wilt.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:61
verse: There is an end of the word of the God enthroned in Ra's seat, lightening the girders of the soul.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:62
verse: To Me do ye reverence! to me come ye through tribulation of ordeal, which is bliss.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:63
verse: The fool readeth this Book of the Law, and its comment; & he understandeth it not.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:64
verse: Let him come through the first ordeal, & it will be to him as silver.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:65
verse: Through the second, gold.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:66
verse: Through the third, stones of precious water.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:67
verse: Through the fourth, ultimate sparks of the intimate fire.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:68
verse: Yet to all it shall seem beautiful. Its enemies who say not so, are mere liars.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:69
verse: There is success.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:70
verse: I am the Hawk-Headed Lord of Silence & of Strength; my nemyss shrouds the night-blue sky.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:71
verse: Hail! ye twin warriors about the pillars of the world! for your time is nigh at hand.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:72
verse: I am the Lord of the Double Wand of Power; the wand of the Force of Coph Nia--but my left hand is empty, for I have crushed an Universe; & nought remains.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:73
verse: Paste the sheets from right to left and from top to bottom: then behold!

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:74
verse: There is a splendour in my name hidden and glorious, as the sun of midnight is ever the son.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX III:75
verse:
The ending of the words is the Word Abrahadabra.
The Book of the Law is Written
and Concealed.
Aum. Ha.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 1
verse: THE COMMENT.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 2
verse: Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 3
verse: The study of this Book is forbidden. It is wise to destroy this copy after the first reading.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 4
verse: Whosoever disregards this does so at his own risk and peril. These are most dire.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 5
verse: Those who discuss the contents of this Book are to be shunned by all, as centres of pestilence.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 6
verse: All questions of the Law are to be decided only by appeal to my writings, each for himself.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 7
verse: There is no law beyond Do what thou wilt.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 8
verse: Love is the law, love under will.

title: Liber L. Vel Legis Sub Figura CCXX as delivered by LXXVIII unto DCLXVI
label: LIBER CCXX The Comment 9
verse:
The priest of the princes,
Ankh-f-n-khonsu

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:1
verse: The lightnings increased and the Lord Tahuti stood forth. The Voice came from the Silence. Then the One ran and returned.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:2
verse: Now hath Nuit veiled herself, that she may open the gate of her sister.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:3
verse: The Virgin of God is enthroned upon an oyster-shell; she is like a pearl, and seeketh Seventy to her Four. In her heart is Hadit the invisible glory.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:4
verse: Now riseth Ra-Hoor-Khuit, and dominion is established in the Star of the Flame.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:5
verse: Also is the Star of the Flame exalted, bringing benediction to the universe.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:6
verse: Here then beneath the winged Eros is youth, delighting in the one and the other. He is Asar between Asi and Nepthi; he cometh forth from the veil.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:7
verse: He rideth upon the chariot of eternity; the white and the black are harnessed to his car. Therefore he reflecteth the Fool, and the sevenfold veil is reveiled. {71}

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:8
verse: Also came forth mother Earth with her lion, even Sekhet, the lady of Asi.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:9
verse: Also the Priest veiled himself, lest his glory be profaned, lest his word be lost in the multitude.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:10
verse: Now then the Father of all issued as a mighty wheel; the Sphinx, and the dog-headed god, and Typhon, were bound on his circumference.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:11
verse: Also the lady Maat with her feather and her sword abode to judge the righteous. For Fate was already established.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:12
verse: Then the holy one appeared in the great water of the North; as a golden dawn did he appear, bringing benediction to the fallen universe.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:13
verse: Also Asar was hidden in Amennti; and the Lords of Time swept over him with the sickle of death.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:14
verse: And a mighty angel appeared as a woman, pouring vials of woe upon the flames, lighting the pure stream with her brand of cursing. And the iniquity was very great.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:15
verse: Then the Lord Khem arose, He who is holy among the highest, and set up his crowned staff for to redeem the universe.
