title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:16
verse: He smote the towers of wailing; he brake them in pieces in the fire of his anger, so that he alone did escape from the ruin thereof.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:17
verse: Transformed, the holy virgin appeared as a fluidic fire, making her beauty into a thunderbolt.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:18
verse: By her spells she invoked the Scarab, the Lord Kheph-Ra, so that the waters were cloven and the illusion of the towers was destroyed. {72}

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:19
verse: Then the sun did appear unclouded, and the mouth of Asi was on the mouth of Asar.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:20
verse: Then also the Pyramid was builded so that the Initiation might be complete.

title: Liber Arcanorum GR:tau-omega-nu ATV tau-omicron-upsilon TAHVTI QUAS VIDIT ASAR IN AMENNTI Sub Figura CCXXXI Liber Carcerorum tau-omega-nu QLIPHOTH cum suis Geniis. Adduntur Sigilla et Nomina Eorum
label: LIBER CCXXXI I:21
verse: And in the heart of the Sphinx danced the Lord Adonai, in His garlands of roses and pearls making glad the concourse of things; yea, making glad the concourse of things.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:0
verse: Gnarled Oak of God! In thy branches is the lightning nested! Above thee hangs the Eyeless Hawk.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:1
verse: Thou art blasted and black! Supremely solitary in that heath of scrub.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:2
verse: Up! The ruddy clouds hang over thee! It is the storm.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:3
verse: There is a flaming gash in the sky.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:4
verse: Up.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:5
verse: Thou art tossed about in the grip of the storm for an Ã¦on and an Ã¦on and an Ã¦on. But thou givest not thy sap; thou fallest not.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:6
verse: Only in the end shalt thou give up thy sap when the great God F.I.A.T. is enthroned on the day of Be-with-Us.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:7
verse: For two things are done and a third thing is begun. Isis and Osiris are given over to incest and adultery. Horus leaps up thrice armed from the womb of his mother. Harpocrates his twin is hidden within him. Set is his holy covenant, that he shall display in the great day of M.A.A.T., that is being interpreted the Master of the Temple of Aâˆ´Aâˆ´, whose name is Truth.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:8
verse: Now in this is the magical power known.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:9
verse: It is like the oak that hardens itself and bears up against the storm. It is weather-beaten and scarred and confident like a sea-captain.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:10
verse: Also it straineth like a hound in the leash.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:11
verse: It hath pride and great subtlety. Yea, and glee also!

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:12
verse: Let the magus act thus in his conjuration.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:13
verse: Let him sit and conjure; let him draw himself together in that forcefulness; let him rise next swollen and straining; let him dash back the hood from his head and fix his basilisk eye upon the sigil of the demon. Then let him sway the force of him to and fro like a satyr in silence, until the Word burst from his throat.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:14
verse: Then let him not fall exhausted, although he might have been ten thousandfold the human; but that which floodeth him is the infinite mercy of the Genitor-Genetrix of the Universe, whereof he is the Vessel.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:15
verse: Nor do thou deceive thyself. It is easy to tell the live force from the dead matter. It is no easier to tell the live snake from the dead snake.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:16
verse: Also concerning vows. Be obstinate, and be not obstinate. Understand that the yielding of the Yoni is one with the lengthening of the Lingam. Thou art both these; and thy vow is but the rustling of the wind on Mount Meru.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:17
verse: Now shalt thou adore me who am the Eye and the Tooth, the Goat of the Spirit, the Lord of Creation. I am the Eye in the Triangle, the Silver Star that ye adore.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:18
verse: I am Baphomet, that is the Eightfold Word that shall be equilibrated with the Three.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:19
verse: There is no act or passion that shall not be a hymn in mine honour.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:20
verse: All holy things and all symbolic things shall be my sacraments.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:21
verse: These animals are sacred unto me; the goat, and the duck, and the ass, and the gazelle, the man, the woman and the child.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:22
verse: All corpses are sacred unto me; they shall not be touched save in mine eucharist. All lonely places are sacred unto me; where one man gathereth himself together in my name, there will I leap forth in the midst of him.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:23
verse: I am the hideous god; and who mastereth me is uglier than I.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:24
verse: Yet I give more than Bacchus and Apollo; my gifts exceed the olive and the horse.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:25
verse: Who worshippeth me must worship me with many rites.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:26
verse: I am concealed with all concealments; when the Most Holy Ancient One is stripped and driven through the marketplace I am still secret and apart.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:27
verse: Whom I love I chastise with many rods.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:28
verse: All things are sacred to me; no thing is sacred from me.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:29
verse: For there is no holiness where I am not.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:30
verse: Fear not when I fall in the fury of the storm; for mine acorns are blown afar by the wind; and verily I shall rise again, and my children about me, so that we shall uplift our forest in Eternity.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:31
verse: Eternity is the storm that covereth me.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:32
verse: I am Existence, the Existence that existeth not save through its own Existence, that is beyond the Existence of Existences, and rooted deeper than the No-Thing-Tree in the Land of No-Thing.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:33
verse: Now therefore thou knowest when I am within thee, when my hood is spread over thy skull, when my might is more than the penned Indus, and resistless as the Giant Glacier.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:34
verse: For as thou art before a lewd woman in Thy nakedness in the bazaar, sucked up by her slyness and smiles, so art thou wholly and no more in part before the symbol of the beloved, though it be but a Pisacha or a Yantra or a Deva.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:35
verse: And in all shalt thou create the Infinite Bliss, and the next link of the Infinite Chain.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:36
verse: This chain reaches from Eternity to Eternity, ever in trianglesâ€” is not my symbol a triangle?â€” ever in circlesâ€” is not the symbol of the Beloved a circle? Therein is all progress base illusion, for every circle is alike and every triangle alike!

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:37
verse: But the progress is progress, and progress is rapture, constant, dazzling, showers of light, waves of dew, flames of the hair of the Great Goddess, flowers of the roses that are about her neck, Amen!

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:38
verse: Therefore lift up thyself as I am lifted up. Hold thyself in as I am master to accomplish. At the end, be the end far distant as the stars that lie in the navel of Nuit, do thou slay thyself as I at the end am slain, in the death that is life, in the peace that is mother of war, in the darkness that holds light in his hand, as an harlot that plucks a jewel from her nostrils.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX I:39
verse: So therefore the beginning is delight, and the End is delight, and delight is in the midst, even as the Indus is water in the cavern of the glacier, and water among the greater hills and the lesser hills and through the ramparts of the hills and through the plains, and water at the mouth thereof when it leaps forth into the mighty sea, yea, into the mighty sea.

title: Liber A'ASH Vel Capricorni Pneumatici Sub Figura CCCLXX
label: LIBER CCCLXX Comment
verse: (The Interpretation of this Book will be given to members of the Grade of Dominus Liminis on application, each to his Adeptus.)

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:0
verse: In the top quarter of the page is an elongated Hebrew letter Taw, and within this letter are all the other Hebrew letters except Taw, arranged in three rows and seven columns. These Hebrew letters proceed from right to left thusly:

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:1
verse: 1st row: ZAIN      VAU       HEH       DALET     GIMEL     BET       ALEPH

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:2
verse: 2nd row: NUN       MEM       LAMED     KAPH      YOD       TET       CHET

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:3
verse:
3rd row: SHIN      RESH      QOF       TZADDI    PE        AYIN      SAMEKH
The text given below is presented vertically below each of the seven columns, beginning on the right. The text is bordered on right and left by lotus crowned wands.
"The Magister Templi, the Adeptus, the Neophyte [8 Degree=3Square, 5 Degree=6Square, 0 Degree=0Square]

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:4
verse: "The Ultimate Illusion, the Illusion of Force, the Illusion of Matter.

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:5
verse: "The Functions of the 3 Orders: Silence in Speech; Silence; Speech in Silence: Construction, Preservation, Destruction.

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:6
verse: "The Supreme Unveiling (or Unveiling of Light), the Unveiling of Life, the Unveiling of Love.

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:7
verse: "Equilibrium; on the Cubic Stone, on the Path, and among the Shells.

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:8
verse: "The Rituals of Initiation, 8 Degree=3Square, 5 Degree=6Square, 0 Degree=0Square: Asar, as Bull, as Man, as Sun.

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:9
verse: "The Ordeals of Initiation, 8 Degree=3Square, 5 Degree=6Square, 0 Degree=0Square: Birth, Death, Resurrection."}

title: Liber TAV Vel Kabbalae Trium Literarum Sub Figura CD
label: LIBER CD I:10
verse: [This analysis may be checked by adding the columns vertically, 69, 81, 93, 114, 135, 246, 357. Dividing by 3 we get 23, 27, 31, 38, 45, 82, 119, which in the Sepher Sephiroth mean respectively Life, Purity, Negation, "38x11=418," Innocent, Formation, Prayer, Weeping. The analogies are obvious.]

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:0
verse: O my God! One is Thy Beginning! One is Thy Spirit, and Thy Permutation One!

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:1
verse: Let me extol Thy perfections before men.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:2
verse: In the Image of a Sixfold Star that flameth across the Vault inane, let me re-veil Thy perfections.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:3
verse: Thou hast appeared unto me as an aged God, a venerable God, the Lord of Time, bearing a sharp sickle.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:4
verse: Thou hast appeared unto me as a jocund and ruddy God, full of Majesty, a King, a Father in his prime. Thou didst bear the sceptre of the Universe, crowned with the Wheel of the Spirit.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:5
verse: Thou hast appeared unto me with sword and spear, a warrior God in flaming armour among Thine horsemen.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:6
verse: Thou hast appeared unto me as a young and brilliant God, a god of music and beauty, even as a young god in his strength, playing upon the lyre.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:7
verse: Thou hast appeared unto me as the white foam of Ocean gathered into limbs whiter than the foam, the limbs of a miracle of women, as a goddess of extreme love, bearing the girdle of gold.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:8
verse: Thou hast appeared to me as a young boy mischievous and lovely, with Thy winged globe and its serpents set upon a staff.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:9
verse: Thou hast appeared to me as an huntress among Thy dogs, as a goddess virginal chaste, as a moon among the faded oaks of the wood of years.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:10
verse: But I was deceived by none of these. All these I cast aside, crying: Begone! So that all these faded from my vision.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:11
verse: Also I welded together the Flaming Star and the Sixfold Star in the forge of my soul, and behold! a new star 418 that is above all these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:12
verse: Yet even so was I not deceived; for the crown hath twelve rays.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII I:13
verse: And these twelve rays are one.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:0
verse: Now then I saw these things averse and evil; and they were not, even as Thou art Not.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:1
verse: I saw the twin heads that ever battle against one another, so that all their thought is a confusion. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:2
verse: I saw the darkeners of wisdom, like black apes chattering vile nonsense. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:3
verse: I saw the devouring mothers of Hell, that eat up their children O ye that are without understanding! I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:4
verse: I saw the merciless and the unmajestic like harpies tearing their foul food. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:5
verse: I saw the burning ones, giants like volcanoes belching out the black vomit of fire and smoke in their fury. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:6
verse: I saw the petty, the quarrelsome, the selfish, they were like men, O Lord, they were even like unto men. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:7
verse: I saw the ravens of death, that flew with hoarse cries upon the carrion earth. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:8
verse: I saw the lying spirits like frogs upon the earth, and upon the water, and upon the treacherous metal that corrodeth all things and abideth not. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:9
verse: I saw the obscene ones, bull-men linked in the abyss of putrefaction, that gnawed each other's tongues for pain. I saw Thee in these.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:10
verse: I saw the Woman. O my God, I beheld the image thereof, even as a lovely shape that concealeth a black monkey, even as a figure that draweth with her hands small images of men down into hell. I saw her from the head to the navel a woman, from the navel to the feet of her a man. I saw Thee even in her.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:11
verse: For mine was the keyword to the Closed Palace 418 and mine the reins of the Chariot of the Sphinxes, black and white.  But I was not deceived by anything of all these things.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:12
verse: For I expanded it by my subtlety into Twelve Rays of the Crown.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII II:13
verse: And these twelve rays were One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:0
verse: Say thou that He God is one; God is the Everlasting One; nor hath He any Equal, or any Son, or any Companion. Nothing shall stand before His face.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:1
verse: Even for five hundred and eleven times nightly for one and forty days did I cry aloud unto the Lord the affirmation of His Unity.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:2
verse: Also did I glorify His wisdom, whereby He made the worlds.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:3
verse: Yea, I praised Him for His intelligible essence, whereby the universe became light.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:4
verse: I did thank Him for His manifold mercy; I did worship His magnificence and majesty.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:5
verse: I trembled before His might.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:6
verse: I delighted in the Harmony and Beauty of His Essence.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:7
verse: In His Victory I pursued His enemies; yea I drave them down the steep; I thundered after them into the utmost abyss; yea, therein I partook of the glory of my Lord.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:8
verse: His Splendour shone upon me; I adored His adorable splendour.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:9
verse: I rested myself, admiring the Stability of Him, how the shaking of His Universe, the dissolution of all things, should move Him not.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:10
verse: Yea, verily, I the Lord Viceregent of His Kingdom, I, Adonai, who speak unto my servant V.V.V.V.V. did rule and govern in His place.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:11
verse: Yet also did I formulate the word of double power in the Voice of the Master, even the word 418.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:12
verse: And all these things deceived me not, for I expanded them by my subtlety into the Twelve Rays of the Crown.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII III:13
verse: And these twelve rays were One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:0
verse: Also the little child, the lover of Adonai, even V.V.V.V.V., reflecting the glory of Adonai, lifted up his voice and said:

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:1
verse: Glory to God, and Thanksgiving to God! There is One God alone, and God is exceeding great. He is about us, and there is no strength save in Him the exalted, the great.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:2
verse: Thus did V.V.V.V.V. become mad, and wend about naked.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:3
verse: And all these things fled away, for he understood them all, that they were but as old rags upon the Divine Perfection.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:4
verse: Also he pitied them all, that they were but reflections distorted.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:5
verse: Also he smote them, lest they should bear rule over the just.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:6
verse: Also he harmonized them into one picture, beautiful to behold.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:7
verse: And having thus conquered them, there was a certain glamour of holiness even in the hollow sphere of outward brilliance.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:8
verse: So that all became splendid.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:9
verse: And having firmly stablished them in order and disposition,

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:10
verse: He proclaimed the perfection, the bride, the delight of God in His creation.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:11
verse: But though thus he worked, he tried ever his work by the Star 418.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:12
verse: And it deceived him not; for by his subtlety he expanded it all into the Twelve Rays of the Crown.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII IV:13
verse: And these twelve rays were One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:0
verse: In the place of the cross the indivisible point which hath no points nor parts nor magnitude. Nor indeed hath it position, being beyond space. Nor hath it existence in time, for it is beyond Time. Nor hath it cause or effect, seeing that its Universe is infinite every way, and partaketh not of these our conceptions.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:1
verse: So wrote the Exempt Adept, and the laughter of the Masters of the Temple abashed him not.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:2
verse: Nor was he ashamed, hearing the laughter of the little dogs of hell.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:3
verse: For he abode in his place, and his falsehood was truth in his place.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:4
verse: The little dogs cannot correct him, for they can do naught but bark.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:5
verse: The masters cannot correct him, for they say: Come and see.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:6
verse: And I came and saw, even I, Perdurabo, the Philosophus of the Outer College.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:7
verse: Yea, even I the man beheld this wonder.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:8
verse: And I could not deliver it unto myself.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:9
verse: That which established me is invisible and unknowable in its essence.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:10
verse: Only they who know IT may be known.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:11
verse: For they have the genius of the mighty sword 418.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:12
verse: And they are not deceived by any of these things; for by their subtlety do they expand them all into the Twelve Rays of the Crown.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII V:13
verse: And these twelve rays are One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:0
verse: Deeper and deeper into the mire of things!  Farther and farther into the never-ending Expansion of the Abyss.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:1
verse: The great goddess that bendeth over the Universe is my mistress; I am the winged globe at her heart.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:2
verse: I contract ever as she ever expandeth;

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:3
verse: At the end it is all one.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:4
verse: Our loves have brought to birth the Father and Creator of all things.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:5
verse: He hath established the elements; the aether, the air, the water, the earth, and the fire.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:6
verse: He hath established the wandering stars in their courses.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:7
verse: He hath ploughed with the seven stars of his Plough, that the Seven might move indeed, yet ever point to the unchanging One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:8
verse: He hath established the Eight Belts, wherewith he hath girdled the globes.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:9
verse: He hath established the Trinity of Triads in all things, forcing fire into fire, and ordering all things in the Stable Abode of the Kings of aegypt.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:10
verse: He hath established His rule in His kingdom.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:11
verse: Yet the Father also boweth unto the Power of the Star 418 and thereby.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:12
verse: In his subtlety He expandeth it all into twelve rays of the Crown.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VI:13
verse: And these twelve rays are One.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:0
verse: Then in the might of the Lion did I formulate unto myself that holy and formless fire, which darteth and flasheth through the depths of the Universe.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:1
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh the earth melted into a liquor clear as water.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:2
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh the water smoked into a lucid air.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:3
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh the air ignited, and became Fire.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:4
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh, O Lord, the Fire dissipated into Space.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:5
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh, O Lord, the Space resolved itself into a Profundity of Mind.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:6
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh the Mind of the Father was broken up into the brilliance of our Lord the Sun.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:7
verse: At the touch of the Fire Qadosh the Brilliance of our Lord was absorbed in the Naught of our Lady of the Body of the Milk of the Stars.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:8
verse: Then only was the Fire Qadosh extinguished, when the Enterer was driven back from the threshold,

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:9
verse: And the Lord of Silence was established upon the Lotus flower.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:10
verse: Then was accomplished all that which was to be accomplished.

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:11
verse: And All and One and Naught were slain in the slaying of the Warrior 418,

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:12
verse: In the slaying of the subtlety that expanded all these things into then Twelve Rays of the Crown,

title: LIBER DCCCXIII Vel Ararita Sub Figura DLXX
label: LIBER DCCCXIII VII:13
verse: That returned unto One, and beyond One, even unto the vision of the Fool in his folly that chanted the word Ararita, and beyond the Word and the Fool; yea, beyond the Word and the Fool.
